### Community Indigenous Support Services

#### Date Posted: 06 March 2024

#### Deadline to Respond: 22 March 2024, 13:00:00

Correctional Service Canada is seeking the provision of support and services to Indigenous offenders who are exiting incarceration and are unable to return to their home communities.

**Notice Details:**

* Solicitation Number: 21206-24-4649623
* Reference Number: cb-250-18864676
* Amendment Number: 1
* Expected Contract Start Date: 01 April 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2027

**Services:**

Vocational Rehabilitation Services (UNSPSC Code: 86101803)

The contracting entity is seeking a supplier to provide vocational rehabilitation services to Indigenous offenders, with the goal of supporting their reintegration into society.

**Submission Requirements:**

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the CanadaBuys website.

* Tender Documents: A tender notice and corresponding attachment are available for download from the CanadaBuys website at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33598/acan---community-indigenous-support-services---21206-24-4649623.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33598/acan---community-indigenous-support-services---21206-24-4649623.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact:

* Claudia Landry
* E-mail: [claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:claudia.landry@csc-scc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (506) 378-8722
* Address: 1045 Main Street, Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada E1C 1H1

Note that this notice is an Advance Contract Award Notice, and all submissions will be evaluated based on their compliance with the requirements outlined in the tender notice. The delegation of contract authority has been exercised, and a contract will be awarded once all evaluation steps have been completed. Late bids will not be accepted.
